Package gestureListeners.transformation

Class Summary
ArcBall3DListener This class represents a GestureEventListener, which can rotate an MT3DObject appropriate to drawn gestures.
CentricRotation3DListener This class provides ways and means to rotate an AbstractGUIComponent in 3-dimensional space around an arbitrary vector.
Displacement2DListener This class is a gesture listener which is able to move an arbitrary GUI-component parallel to the view-plane with one fingertip.
Displacement3DLineListener This class lets you displace objects of type AbstractGUIComponent along a vector which you can specify.
Displacement3DPlaneListener This class lets you displace objects of type AbstractGUIComponent along a plane which you can specify.
Rotation3DListener This class provides ways and means to rotate an AbstractGUIComponent in 3-dimensional space around an arbitrary vector.
Scale3DListener This class represents an GestureEventListener, which can scale a gui-component appropriate to drawn gestures.
